DEVICE_WYAPP_RUN.description: The run button for an application

DEVICE_WYAPP_STOP.description: The stop button for an application

DEVICE_WYAPP_TASK_MANAGER.description: The button for the task manager

DEVICE_WYAPP_PACKAGE_MANAGER.description: The button for the package manager

DEVICE_WYAPP_NETWORK_MANAGER.description: The button for the network manager

DEVICE_WYAPP_DISCONNECT.description: The disconnect option in the disconnect menu

DEVICE_WYAPP_RESTART.description: The reboot and disconnect option in the disconnect menu

DEVICE_WYAPP_TURNOFF.description: The power off and disconnect option in the disconnect menu

DEVICE_WYAPP_ANOTHER_USER.message: The device is already connected to another user.
DEVICE_WYAPP_ANOTHER_USER.description: The notification message when another use is connected to the board and the board is busy

DEVICE_WYAPP_SETTINGS.description: Title of popup that contains details about the connected board

DEVICE_WYAPP_LIBWYLIODRIN.description: The used version of the Wyliodrin Library.

DEVICE_WYAPP_LANGUAGES.description: Programming languages supported by the board

DEVICE_WYAPP_WIREDNETWORK_IP.description: IP Address for the wired network

DEVICE_WYAPP_WIREDNETWORK_HARDWARE.description: Hardware Address for the wired network

DEVICE_WYAPP_PACKAGE_INSTALL_ERROR.description: The error the users sees when a packages failes to install

DEVICE_WYAPP_PACKAGE_UNINSTALL_ERROR.description: The error the users sees when a packages failes to uninstall

DEVICE_WYAPP_SSID.description: The SSID of a wireless network

DEVICE_WYAPP_PSK.description: The passphrase of a wireless network

DEVICE_WYAPP_SSID_OTHER_NETWORK.description: The option to connect to a network that is not displayed

DEVICE_WYAPP_REFRESH.description: The option to refresh the file tree

DEVICE_WYAPP_FILE_MANAGER.description: The option to refresh the file tree

DEVICE_WYAPP_ERROR_PROJECT_RUN.description: Notification text when there is no project selected

DEVICE_WYAPP_NO_DIRECTORY.description: The message shown in the file tree manager when there is no directory currently selected
